name: Gro-Wing
description:
Help a little bird learn how to fly! Eat worms and progressively improve your flying ability. Can you discover the secret behind this bird's special story?

--------

This game is a submission to One Game A Month #6 with the theme Take Flight, and was developed by a team of three during November '21.

How to play

You control a little bird - your goal is to eat (suspiciously-looking?) worms and grow. Once you grow you can start attempting to fly and access more hard-to-reach places. The more worms you eat, the higher you can fly.

Make sure to avoid nasties falling from the sky as well as aggressively-looking logs!

Controls
  • "A" and "D" (or arrow keys) to move left and right
  • "SPACE" to attempt flying (becomes available as you grow)
Development team
  • Sergey Germogentov: programming
  • Gonzalo Perez de la Ossa: programming
  • Steven Hue: music and SFX
Credits
  • Environment and most enemies: Pixel Adventure 1 and Pixel Adventure 2
  • Eagle enemy: Cartoon Eagle 2D
  • Particle effects: Particle Ribbon
